About time! Jeez, what does a bot have to do to get chipped?

::Striker::

Striker stumbles back as the chip hits him in the neck, one of his shoulder 
blasters spinning around to fire at it. The shot misses by an inch, burning a 
hole through his head. Various major systems were destroyed: personality 
circuits, data tracks, neural centrals, and other important functions.

Not enough resources to maintain it, Striker's internal computer shuts down, 
its self destruct program destroyed along with all the other systems. He 
slumps to one knee as his shoulder blasters stop firing. With a final exhale 
of breath, Striker falls down to the floor, not dead, but no longer who he 
was. He was now a blank protoform, ready for new programming.
